title: Halloween Costumes
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 41 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile 10L
description: What will you be for Halloween this year? Halloween Costumes provides students a look at costume ideas from pirates and dragons to flowers, and more. Vivid photographs and a repetitive text structure will support beginning readers. The book can also be used to teach students how to classify information and the proper use and identification of nouns.
reviewWords: clown, costume, dragon, look, pirate, superhero
comprehension: Classify Information                : Classify information in text
awareness: Initial Sound                : Discriminate initial consonant /l/ sound
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency words a, I, like
